instruction: Is code ko reverse engineer kariye taake aik naya version banaya ja sake
Recording ko text mein transcribe kariye.
input: Waterloo ki history ke bare mein recording
output: Waterloo ki jang, jo 18 June, 1815 ko ladi gayi, Napoleonic Wars ki aakhri badi jang thi. Is ne Napoleon Bonaparte ke raaj ka khatma kar diya. Yeh jang Napoleon Bonaparte ki French forces aur British, Dutch, Belgian aur Prussian troops ki allied force ke beech ladi gayi, jis ki qiyadat Duke of Wellington kar raha tha. Yeh jang Waterloo ke sheher ke paas ladi gayi jo pehle Austrian Netherlands mein tha, jo ab aaj kal ka Belgium hai. Yeh jang Napoleon ki forces ke liye shikast thi aur Napoleon ke France par raaj ka khatma kar diya. Napoleon khud ko St. Helena exile kar diya gaya, jahan woh 1821 mein mar gaya. Is jang ne Europe par French domination ka khatma kar diya aur region mein aman ke daur ki shuruaat ki. Yeh Napoleonic Wars ki aakhri badi jang bhi thi aur history ki sabse ahem jangon mein se aik ke taur par yaad ki jaati hai. Waterloo mein allied forces ki fatah ne Europe mein French imperial ambitions ka khatma karne mein madad ki. Is ne British ko Europe ki sabse taqatwar nations mein se aik ke taur par establish kar diya. Yeh jang infantry, cavalry, aur artillery tactics ke combination se ladi gayi, aur warfare ki tabdeel hoti nature ki shuruaat dikhayi. Halanke French forces allies se kahin zyada thi, unki strategic aur tactical ghalti ne jang ki shikast ka baais bana. Is shikast ne Europe mein French imperial power ke khatme ka ishara diya. Waterloo ki legacy aaj bhi qaim hai, aur is ne agle sau saal ke liye British Empire ki position ko mazboot kar diya.

instruction: Diye gaye topic ke bare mein aik chhota paragraph likhiye.
input: Renewable energy istimaal karne ki ahmiyat
output: Renewable energy ka istemal tezi se barh raha hai relevance aur ahmiyat mein jaise ke duniya climate change se ladne ke liye solutions ki taraf dekh rahi hai. Renewable energy sources, jaise ke solar, wind, aur hydropower, sustainable hain aur traditional energy sources jaise coal aur oil ke mukable mein bohot kam environmental impact rakhte hain. Renewable energy ki taraf switch karna carbon emissions ko kam kar sakta hai, air quality ko behtar bana sakta hai, non-renewable resources par dependency ko kam kar sakta hai, aur aik stable aur secure energy future provide kar sakta hai. Renewable energy sustainable future hasil karne ke liye zaroori hai aur kisi bhi country ke energy portfolio ka ahem hissa hona chahiye.

instruction: Diye gaye passage ka khulasa kariye.
input: Aik recent study ne dikhaya hai ke global climate change aaj duniya ke samne sabse ahem challenges mein se aik hai. Global warming ke consequences mein rising sea levels, extreme weather events aur biodiversity loss shamil hain. Climate change human activities jaise ke fossil fuels jalane se hota hai, aur agar ise control na kiya gaya to planet par long-term aur devastating impacts honge.
output: Aik recent study ne zahir kiya hai ke global climate change duniya ke sabse pressing issues mein se aik hai. Rising sea levels, extreme weather events aur biodiversity loss ke alawa, yeh largely human activities jaise ke fossil fuels jalane se hota hai. Agar unchecked chhod diya jaye to climate change ke far-reaching aur devastating consequences honge.

output: Ek zamane mein, Alexa naam ki ek jawaan larki rehti thi jo ek shandar magical bow aur arrow ke saath paida hui thi. Jab bhi woh apna bow kheench kar arrow chhorti thi, jahan bhi woh girti thi, kuch extraordinary hota tha. Phool khilte the, samundar shant ho jate the, aur suraj zyada chamakta tha. Alexa ka bow aur arrow itne powerful the, ke woh sabse namumkin cheezon ko bhi mumkin bana sakte the. Ek din, ek bade toofan ke dauran, Alexa ne apne magical bow aur arrow ka istemal kar ke apne hometown mein sukoon aur harmony layi. Puri town ne uski tareef aur jashn manaya, aur woh jald hi umeed aur aman ki alamat ban gayi.

instruction: Koi recent movie jo aap ne dekhi hai uska review likhiye.
input: Parasite (2019)
output: Maine haal hi mein movie Parasite dekhi, jo Bong Joon-Ho ne direct ki hai, aur main bilkul hairaan reh gaya. Yeh movie genres ka masterful blend hai—yeh black comedy bhi hai aur classism par commentary bhi, aik twist ending ke saath jo koi nahi dekh sakta tha aane wala. Acting fantastic hai, khaas taur par Song Kang-ho jo poor household ke head ka role karta hai, aur cinematography stunning hai. Movie mein humor aur thought-provoking drama ka perfect balance hai, aur yeh aap ko ending ke bare mein dinon tak baat karne par majboor kar degi. Overall, main Parasite ki highly recommend karta hun; yeh aik exceptional movie hai aur aik aisa experience hai jo aap jaldi nahi bhoolenge.

instruction: Do qisam ke text processing techniques ka muqaysa kariye aur un ke darmiyan farq ki wazahat kariye.
input: Rule-Based Text Processing aur Deep Learning Based Text Processing
output: Rule-based text processing hand-crafted rules par based hai text ko samajhne ke liye. Ye human experts par rely karta hai rules define karne ke liye, jis mein kaafi time aur effort lag sakta hai. Ye text ko accurately parse aur manipulate kar sakta hai, lekin iska accuracy aur speed limited hai. Deep learning based text processing algorithms use karta hai datasets se seekhne ke liye aur text se patterns extract karne ke liye. Ye text ko high accuracy ke saath process kar sakta hai aur rule-based text processing se kaafi zyada fast rate mein. Deep learning models bhi zyada flexible hote hain aur different tasks ke liye little effort ke saath adapt ho sakte hain. Deep learning is tarah zyada complex text processing tasks ke liye better suited hai.

instruction: Neeche diye gaye article ko 5 jumlon mein summarize kariye.
input: COVID-19 crisis ne hamari rozana zindagi mein bohat se tabdeeliyaan layi hain, jismein hamara kaam karne aur interact karne ka tareeqa bhi shamil hai. Ghar se kaam karna bohat se logon ke liye norm ban gaya hai, lekin iske saath apne khaas challenges bhi aaye hain. Remotely kaam karte waqt productive aur motivated rehna mushkil ho sakta hai, khaas tor par agar aap burned out ya isolated mehsoos kar rahe hain. To aap iska behtar faayda kaise utha sakte hain? Yahan kuch tips hain jo aapko ghar se kaam karte waqt productive rehne mein madad kar sakti hain.
output: COVID-19 pandemic ke doran ghar se kaam karna apne challenges rakhta hai. Jab aap burnt out ya isolated feel kar rahe hon to productive rehna mushkil ho sakta hai. Iska behtar faida uthane ke liye, time management aur goals par focus karna motivation maintain karne mein madad kar sakta hai. Additionally, breaks lena zaroori hai, colleagues ke saath engaging conversations karna aur kaam karte waqt social media se door rehne ki koshish karna. Finally, aik designated workspace rakhna zaroori hai taake aap organised aur productive reh sakein.

Day 3: Famous British Museum visit kariye, uske baad bustling aur vibrant Covent Garden ka trip kariye. Uske baad, iconic Big Ben tak delightful walk kariye, jo London ka sabse iconic clock tower hai. Din ko London Eye ke views se ghire hue quiet aur cozy dinner ke saath khatam kariye.

instruction: Diye gaye data ka istemal karte hue aik listicle banayiye.
input:
Topic: Financial Planning ke liye Tips
List:
1. Budget set kariye
2. Apne spending ko track kariye
3. Stocks mein invest kariye
4. Debts ada kariye
output:
Financial Planning Ke Liye 10 Tips

1. Budget set kariye aur us par qaim rahiye. Har mahine aap ke paas kitna paisa aa raha hai aur ja raha hai yeh janna sound financial plan banane ki chaabi hai.

2. Apne spending ko track kariye. Apne tamam kharche likh kar rakhiye taake aap ko sahi andaza ho sake ke aap ka paisa kahan ja raha hai.

3. Stocks mein invest kariye. Stocks mein investment long term mein aap ke paise badhane ka behtareen tareeqa hai.

4. Debts ada kariye. High-interest rate debt se jitni jaldi ho sake chhutkaara hasil kariye.

5. Savings plan banayiye. Har mahine apni income ka hissa alag rakhna financial stability banane ki chaabi hai.

6. Credit scores par nazar rakhiye. Apne credit score ko monitor kariye taake aap ko financial products par behtar deals mil sakein.

7. Tax credits aur deductions ki research kariye. Mukhtalif tax incentives ke bare mein janna income taxes par paisa bachane mein madad kar sakta hai.

8. Apne assets ki hifazat kariye. Apne ghar, cars, aur health jaise cheezon ke liye insurance mein invest kariye.

9. Retirement accounts mein invest kariye. Long-term financial security banane ke liye retirement accounts zaroori hain.

10. Expert advice hasil kariye. Financial advisors aap ko apne paise ka behtar istemaal karne aur mustaqbil ke liye tayyari karne mein madad kar sakte hain.

AI mundane tasks ko behtar banane ya automate karne, jaldi patterns identify karne, aur future events predict karne ke liye istemal hota hai.
output: AI study ka aik field hai jo technology ke zariye human abilities ko replicate ya enhance karne ka maqsad rakhta hai. Iske applications zyada tar mundane hain aur task automation, pattern recognition aur future events ki prediction ke gird ghoomte hain. Lekin, iske badhte hue capabilities ki wajah se possible existential threats ka khauf hai.

instruction: Is sawal ka mukhtasar jawab diye.
input: Ponzi scheme aur pyramid scheme mein kya farq hai?
output: Ponzi scheme aur pyramid scheme ke beech asli farq unke kaam karne ke tareeqe mein hai. Ponzi schemes ek hi entity ya shakhs par nirbhar karte hain logon ko unke paise se bewaqoof banane ke liye, jabke pyramid schemes participants par nirbhar karte hain naye members ko recruit karne ke liye apni earnings badhane ke liye. Ponzi scheme mein, fraudster naye investors se funds maangega aur us paise ko pehle wale investors ko wapas karne ke liye istemaal karega; pyramid scheme mein, members ko naye participants se paise milte hain jo unke neeche recruit hote hain, jiske natije mein recruitment ka chain banta hai.

instruction: Technology ne hamari kaam karne ki tareeke ko kaise badla hai iska wazahat kariye.
input: Noinput
output: Technology ne hamari kaam karne ki tareeqe ko bilkul badal diya hai, jis se hum zyada productive aur efficient ho sakte hain. Internet, misal ke tor par, research, communication aur collaboration ko pehle se kahin zyada aasan bana diya hai. Automation technologies ne workflows ko streamline aur optimize karna mumkin bana diya hai, jis ka natija high quality work aur behtar customer service hai. Cloud computing ne data storage aur access mein inqilab la diya hai, jis se businesses apne data ko kahin se bhi access kar sakti hain. Akhir mein, AI aur machine learning ne businesses ko data-driven decisions aur predictions pehle se kahin zyada tezi se karne ki suvidha di hai.

instruction: Neeche diye gaye instructions ko step by step guide mein structure kariye.
input: LinkedIn par kisi se job related advice ke liye conversation shuru kariye.
output:
LinkedIn par job related advice ke liye kisi se conversation shuru karne ka Step by Step Guide:

Step 1: Identify kariye ke aap kis se contact karna chahte hain - Career advice ke bare mein sochen jo aap ko chahiye, aur LinkedIn profiles search kariye un logon ki jo ye advice de sakte hain.

Step 2: Unke profile ko dekhen - Us shakhs ke profile ko parhen ta ke unhen behtar jaan saken – unka background, credentials, jo topics mein unki dilchaspi hai, aur past mein unhon ne kya conversations ki hain.

Step 3: Engaging message banayiye - Aik engaging message craft kariye jo aap ki interest convey kare, explain kare ke aap kyun contact kar rahe hain aur koi request kare ya sawal puche.

Step 4: Message send kariye – Message send kariye aur response ka intezar kariye.

Step 5: Zarurat ke mutabiq follow up kariye – Agar aap ko turant response nahi milta, to polite reminder ke sath follow up kariye aur aksar auqat, aap ko response mil jayega.

instruction: Wazahat kariye ke yeh statement kyun sach hai.
input: Aik kamyab sales pitch mein potential buyer ko engage karna chahiye.
output: Aik kamyab sales pitch mein potential buyer ko engage karna chahiye kyunke unhe engage karna trust aur rapport banane mein madad karta hai. Jab potential buyers engage hote hain, to woh salesperson ki baat sunne aur product ya service ke value aur benefits ko samajhne ke liye zyada tayyar hote hain. Aik engaging sales pitch potential buyer ko conclusion tak pahunchne mein bhi zyada madad karta hai, kyunke woh conversation mein actively participate karne ke liye zyada ready hote hain. Potential buyers ko engage karna salespeople ko apne potential customers ke bare mein insights hasil karne aur apni pitch ko unki zarooraton ke mutabiq tailor karne mein bhi madad karta hai.

instruction: Is waaqiye ki tafseel karne ke liye aik narrative banayiye.
input: Balloon ceremony
output:
Yeh aik jazbati event tha jab saikron log aik khaas balloon ceremony mein hissa lene ke liye jama hue. Yeh waqt tha un logon ki izzat aur pehchan karne ka jo hamare se pehle ja chuke hain aur yeh waqt tha un ki zindagiyon ka jashn manane ka jo abhi bhi yahan hain.

Aasman chamakdar rangon se bhara hua tha jaise hawa hansi, aansuon, aur khushi ki awaazon se bhari hui thi. Aik-aik karke, bheed ne balloons ko hawa mein chhoda jo apne pyare logon ke liye khaas paighamat lekar ja rahe the.

Balloons mohabbat aur umeed ka paigham aasman ke upar le kar gaye. Har umar ke log, zindagi ke har sheher se, hairani aur takjub ke saath aasman ki taraf dekh rahe the. Jaise balloons door mein ghayab ho gaye, wahan har koi janta tha ke unka aik hissa le jaya ja raha hai aur yeh hamesha ke liye apne pyare logon ke dilon aur dimagh mein reh jayega.

Yeh mohabbat ki taqat ka aik khoobsurat yaad dilane wala tha aur un tariqon ka jis se yeh hamen un logon se jodne mein madad kar sakti hai jo ab hamare saath nahin hain. Jaise ceremony khatam hui, har koi ne umeed aur sukoon ka naya ehsaas mehsoos kiya.

instruction: Neeche diye gaye passage ke base par, ye determine kariye ke author ka attitude kya hai is idea ke taraf ke speed production mein sabse important factor hai
input: Aaj kal production mein speed par focus aksar ghalat hota hai. Technical proficiency aur craftsmanship ko project jaldi khatam karne ki jaldi ke saamne peeche chhod diya jata hai. Yeh product ke quality ke liye nuqsandeh ho sakta hai, kyunke mehnatee worker ko waqt nahi diya jaega ke woh koi bhi ghaltiyan theek kar sake jo jaldi baazi se paida ho sakti hain.
output: Author ka speed ke is idea ke taraf negative attitude hai ke production mein speed sabse zaroori factor hai. Unka argument hai ke speed par focus aksar technical proficiency aur craftsmanship ki qeemat par hota hai, jis se kam quality ke products bante hain. Is ke alawa, author ka implication hai ke production ko tez karna nuksandeh ho sakta hai, kyunke worker ke paas koi bhi ghaltiyan theek karne ke liye kaafi time nahi hota. Yeh indicate karta hai ke author ka yaqeen hai ke speed ko quality aur craftsmanship par priority nahi deni chahiye.

instruction: Article parhiye aur central idea ki pehchan kariye.
input:
Yahan article hai.

India mukhtalif cultures, languages, aur religions ka mulk hai. Yeh tamam elements yahan aman se saath rehte hain, jo India ko uski unique aur ameer pehchan dete hain. Mukhtalif backgrounds ke log harmony mein rehte hain aur dosti ke mazboot rishte banate hain jo hamare azeem mulk ki buniyad hain.
output: Article ka markazi khayal yeh hai ke India aik diverse components wala mulk hai, jis mein cultures, languages aur religions shamil hain, jo peacefully saath exist karte hain aur friendship ke mazboot bonds banate hain.

instruction: Diye gaye list ko sort karne ke liye aik algorithm design kariye.
output:
Diye gaye list ke liye aik sorting algorithm ye steps use kar sakta hai:

2. List ke end tak pahunchne tak agle do elements ke saath yahi kaam continue kariye.
3. Steps 1 aur 2 ko repeat kariye jab tak list sorted order mein na aa jaye.
Sorted list ye hogi: [1, 2, 4, 5, 6].

instruction: Agle text ko aik paragraph mein summarize kariye.
input: Personal identity ke theories waqt ke saath badal gaye hain. Maazi ke philosophers ne zyada tar self par focus kiya hai, jabke modern theorists personal narratives aur narrative identities par zyada focus karte hain. Aik misal Locke ki personal identity ki definition hai jo kehti hai ke aap waqt ke saath wohi shakhs hain agar aap ke paas apne maazi ki personal memories hain ya agar aap past experiences ko yaad kar sakte hain. Dusri misal Parfit ka is notion ko reject karna hai aur psychological continuity ki ahmiyat par focus karna hai, jo tab hota hai jab aap wohi rehte hain chahe aap ko aik alag physical world ya body ke saath pesh kiya jaye.
output: Tareekh ke doran, philosophers ne personal identity ke concept par bahas ki hai. Shuru mein, focus primarily self par tha, lekin modern theorists zyada inclined hain personal narratives aur kisi ke narrative identity ko study karne ke liye. Locke ke mutabiq, kisi person ki memories aur unki ability past experiences ko remember karne ki, waqt ke sath apni personal identity maintain karne ke liye key thi. Is ke mukhalif, Parfit ne is view ko reject kiya aur instead ye propose kiya ke psychological continuity wohi person rehne ki key thi. Is mein physical world ya body mein potential changes ke bawajood bhi wohi individual rehna shamil hai.

instruction: Ingredients ki list dekar, vegan curry ka recipe banayiye.
input: 2 cans chickpeas ke, 1 onion, 1 clove garlic ka, 1 inch ginger, 1 teaspoon cumin, 1 teaspoon curry powder, 1 teaspoon turmeric
output:
Vegan Curry
Ingredients:
• 2 cans chickpeas ke
• 1 onion, kata hua
• 1 clove garlic ka, bareek kata hua
• 1 inch ginger ka, kadukash kiya hua
• 1 teaspoon cumin
• 1 teaspoon curry powder
• 1 teaspoon turmeric
Instructions:
1. Bade saucepan mein oil ko medium heat par garam kariye.
2. Onion, garlic aur ginger add kariye. Tab tak pakayiye jab tak onions translucent na ho jayen, taqreeban 5 minutes.
3. Spices add kariye aur tab tak hilaiye jab tak khushbu na aaye.
4. Chickpeas add kariye aur hilaiye taake spice mix se evenly coat ho jayen.
5. 1 cup paani add kariye aur gentle simmer par laiye.
6. 15 minutes ya tab tak pakayiye jab tak sauce thick na ho jaaye aur chickpeas soft na ho jayen.
7. Cooked rice, quinoa ya cauliflower rice ke upar serve kariye. Enjoy!

instruction: Diye gaye array mein maximum sum find karne ke liye aik algorithm specify kariye.
output:
Aik simple solution yeh hai ke array ko traverse kariye aur ab tak mile maximum sum ka track rakhiye. Yeh following approach use kar ke kiya ja sakta hai:
Array ke through iterate kariye aur har element ke liye, ab tak mile maximum sum ko update kariye.

Kisi bhi point par, ab tak mila maximum sum ya to element khud hai ya phir previous maximum sum aur current element ka sum hai.

Is tarah, algorithm ko recursively define kiya ja sakta hai:
maxSum(i) = max(arr[i], maxSum(i-1)+arr[i])

Jahan maxSum(i) maximum sum ko represent karta hai arr[i] ke sath as the last element aur arr[0...i] as the given array.

instruction: Diye gaye venture ke saath jude potential risks ki list banayiye.
input: Aik chhota business shuru karna
output:
1. Financial Risk: Financial resources ki kami, Nakaafi Capital, Ghair mutawaqqa Cash Flow Problems
2. Market Risk: Over-saturation, Ghair munasib Economic Conditions, Nayi Technology se Displacement, Ghair sahayak Government Policies
3. Operational Risk: Nakaafi Business Model, Ghair mahir Employees, Business Process Inefficiencies, Ghair munasib Location
4. Legal Risk: Regulatory Compliance, Intellectual Property Disputes, Ghair mutawaqqa Litigation, Taxation Issues
5. Strategic Risk: Strategic Inadequacies, Rivals ke Superior Competencies, Partners ki Ghair munasib Negotiations, Zyada Customer Attrition Rates

Additionally, wind turbines ka habitats par minimal impact hota hai, kyunki yeh sensitive habitats se door areas mein lagaye ja sakte hain, jaise ke bird nesting grounds.

instruction: Aik input diya gaya hai jis mein article ka hissa hai, article ko mukammal kariye baqi content provide kar ke.
input: Julia aik programming language hai jo technical computing ke liye design kiya gaya hai. Yeh parallel computing aur numerical computing ko support karta hai, jo ise data science, machine learning, aur math-heavy applications ke liye aik ideal choice banata hai.
output: Julia aik high-level, general-purpose programming language hai jo padhne aur likhne mein aasan hone ke liye design kiya gaya hai, aur users ko operations ko concisely aur clearly express karne ki ijazat deta hai. Yeh dynamic languages ki speed aur expressivity ko static types ki efficiency aur safety ke saath combine karta hai. Julia ka multiple dispatch feature users ko sirf aik code ke saath efficient, generic algorithms likhne ki ijazat deta hai. Iske paas parallel aur distributed computing ke liye bhi strong support hai, jo ise large datasets ke saath jaldi aur efficiently kaam karne ke qabil banata hai. Julia ka aik powerful module system hai, jo users ko base language ko variety ke fields se tools aur algorithms ke saath extend karne ki ijazat deta hai, jisme machine learning, data analysis aur visualization, web programming, network programming, aur robotics shamil hain. Julia mein aik optimizing just-in-time (JIT) compiler bhi shamil hai, jo ise native code generate karne ki ijazat deta hai jiska performance statically-typed languages ke qareeb hai aur C ya Fortran ke barabar hai. Overall, Julia aik powerful, reliable, aur high-performance programming language hai jo technical computing ke liye design kiya gaya hai, jo ise data science, machine learning, aur dusre math-heavy applications ke liye ideal choice banata hai.

instruction: Is paragraph mein sentences shamil kariye taake yeh zyada coherent ho jaye.
input: AI ka istemal recent years mein tezi se barh raha hai. Society par iska kya impact hai. Potential benefits aur risks kya hain?
output: AI ka istemal recent years mein tezi se barh raha hai, aur is ka society par bara impact pada hai. AI ke widespread use ke saath potential benefits aur risks dono associated hain, aur dono ke bare mein aware hona zaroori hai. Potential benefits mein improved efficiency aur accuracy shamil hain, jabke potential risks mein job displacement aur privacy concerns ho sakte hain. Society par AI ke implications ko poori tarah samajhne ke liye, positive aur negative aspects dono ko dekhna aur analyze karna zaroori hai.

instruction: Dono qismon ke beech farq ki wazahat kariye
input: Aerobic aur anaerobic exercise
output: Aerobic exercise koi bhi activity hai jo aap ke heart aur breathing rates ko badhati hai aur oxygen use kar ke energy produce karti hai. Aerobic exercise ki misalen running, cycling, aur swimming hain. Anaerobic exercise koi bhi activity hai jo oxygen use kiye bagair energy produce karti hai. Anaerobic exercise ki misalen weight lifting aur sprinting hain. Aerobic aur anaerobic exercise ke beech asli farq yeh hai ke aerobic exercise lambe time periods tak sustain hoti hai aur energy production ke liye oxygen par zyada depend karti hai. Anaerobic exercise, dusri taraf, short bursts mein ki jati hai aur oxygen ka use involve nahi karti.

instruction: Ye equation kaise solve kiya ja sakta hai?
output:
Equation ko hal kiya ja sakta hai kisi aik variable (x ya y) ko isolate kar ke, dono sides ko us variable ke coefficient ke inverse se multiply kar ke aur phir us variable ke liye solve kar ke.
Misal ke tor par, x ke liye solve karne ke liye, hum pehle dono sides ko 4 se divide karte hain, jis se milta hai
$\frac{3x}{4} + y = \frac{20}{4}$.
Phir hum dono sides ko $\frac{4}{3}$ se multiply karte hain ta ke mil jaye
$3x + \frac{4 \times 4}{3}y = \frac{20 \times 4}{3}$.
Aakhir mein, hum dono sides se $\frac{4 \times 4}{3}y$ subtract karte hain ta ke mil jaye
$3x = \frac{20 \times 4}{3} - \frac{4 \times 4}{3}y$.
Phir hum dono sides ko 3 se divide karte hain ta ke mil jaye
$x = \frac{\frac{20 \times 4}{3} - \frac{4 \times 4}{3}y}{3}$.
Ab hamare paas y ke liye aik linear equation hai, jo y ki value ke liye solve kiya ja sakta hai.
Jab hum y ki value jaan jayen, hum ise x ke equation mein substitute kar sakte hain ta ke x ki value calculate kar sakein.

    """
    return x + y

instruction: In dono words ke beech mein farq kariye.
input: Audience aur spectator
output: Audience aur spectator ke beech farq yeh hai ke audience aam tor par logon ka aik group hota hai jo kisi performance ko dekhne ke liye ikattha hote hain, jabke spectator aik individual hota hai jo koi event dekh raha hota hai. Audience aam tor par spectator se zyada interactive hoti hai, performers ke saath engage karti hai aur performance par react karti hai, jabke spectator aam tor par zyada passive hota hai, sirf event ko observe karta hai.

instruction: Dono theories ke darmiyan farq ki list banayiye
input: Behaviorism aur constructivism
output: Behaviorism aur constructivism ke darmiyan farq bohat hain. Behaviorism observable behavior par focus karta hai aur traditionally laboratory experiments mein istemal hota raha hai. Constructivism is idea par based hai ke knowledge learners ke zariye construct hoti hai, sirf receive karne ke bajaye. Behaviorism knowledge ko environment mein mojood samajhta hai, jabke constructivism propose karta hai ke knowledge actively learner ke zariye construct hoti hai. Behaviorism behavior ke discrete units par concentrate karta hai, jabke constructivism holistic approach ko pasand karta hai jo elements ke darmiyan relationships par emphasis karta hai.

instruction: Neeche diye gaye text mein aik missing paragraph add kariye.
input: Integrative medicine apne holistic approach to healthcare ki wajah se popularity hasil kar raha hai. Yeh conventional medicine ko alag practices ke saath combine karta hai jo evidence aur research par based hain.
output: Integrative medicine ka maqsad aik aisa treatment plan banana hai jo individual aur unki specific zarooraton ke mutabiq ho, unke tamam physical, emotional, mental aur spiritual masail ko dhyan mein rakhte hue. Integrative medicine diseases aur illnesses ki prevention par bhi focus karta hai, aur patients ko encourage karta hai ke woh apni health aur wellbeing mein active participants banein. Individualized aur holistic approach apna kar, integrative medicine ka hadaf individual ki overall health aur wellbeing ko behtar banana hai.

instruction: Aapko ingredients ki list di gayi hai aur aapko cake banane ke liye recipe banana hai.
input: Flour - 2 cups, Butter - 1 cup, Sugar - 3/4 cup, Eggs - 2, Baking Soda - 1 teaspoon, Vanilla Extract - 2 teaspoons
output:
Apne oven ko 350 degrees par preheat kariye. Aik 9-inch round cake pan ko grease aur flour kariye.

Aik bade bowl mein, 2 cups flour, 1 cup butter, aur 3/4 cup sugar ko mix kariye jab tak crumbly na ho jaye. 2 eggs, 1 teaspoon baking soda, aur 2 teaspoons vanilla extract add kariye, aur blend hone tak mix kariye. Cake pan mein dal kar 25-30 minutes tak bake kariye ya jab tak cake ke center mein toothpick dal kar clean na nikle. Serve karne se pehle cake ko cool hone diye.

instruction: Is math equation ko solve karne ke liye 5-step process dijiye.
output:
1. Equation ko fraction bar form mein change kariye, taake yeh zyada clearly samjha ja sake: (x^2+5x+6)÷(x-2)
2. Numerator ko factor kariye: (x^2+5x+6) = (x+3)(x+2)
3. Denominator ko simplify kariye: (x-2) = (x+2 - 4) = (x+2) - 4
4. Numerator aur denominator ko simplify kariye: (x+3)(x+2) ÷ (x+2) - 4
5. Numerator aur denominator ko divide kariye: (x+3) ÷ (x+2 - 4)

instruction: Diye gaye problem ko solve karne ke liye aik algorithm banayiye.
input: Problem: 1 aur 100 ke beech 3 aur 5 ke tamam multiples ka sum calculate kariye
output:
Algorithm:
1. Sum ko 0 se initialize kariye.
2. Aik variable i ko 0 set kariye.
3. Jab tak i 100 se kam ya barabar hai, ye kaam kariye:
  a. Agar i, 5 ya 3 se divisible hai, to i ki value ko Sum mein add kariye.
  b. i ko 1 se increment kariye.
4. Sum ki value return kariye.

instruction: Koi aik historical figure select kariye aur unhe study karne ke 5 wajoohat suggest kariye.
input: Mahatma Gandhi
output:
1. Mahatma Gandhi Indian independence movement mein aik leader the, aur apne non-violent protests ke zariye unhon ne peaceful resistance ki taqat aur us ke hasil hone wale accomplishments ka muzahira kiya.
2. Gandhi ka "ahimsa", ya non-violence ka philosophy modern society mein bohat influential hai aur is ne beshumar activists, politicians, aur citizens ko peace aur justice ke liye koshish karne ki inspiration di hai.
3. Un ki zindagi aur kaam is baat ka model hai ke kaise ordinary log extraordinary changes la sakte hain, aur un ka mutala karne se valuable insight mil sakti hai ke individuals kaise impact bana sakte hain.
4. Gandhi ne aik fascinating zindagi guzari jo continents tak pheli hui thi, aur un ki kahani complex themes ko chhuti hai jo politics aur economics se lekar spirituality aur philosophy tak hain.
5. Gandhi ke legacy ke bare mein bohat kuch likha gaya hai, isliye un ka mutala karna international relations aur un ki zindagi aur kaam ke gird larger historical context ke bare mein seekhne ka aik behtareen tareeqa ho sakta hai.

instruction: Do mukhtalif qisam ke lead magnets ke characteristics ka muqaysa kariye.
input: Webinar aur Ebook
output: Webinars aur ebooks dono ko lead magnets ke tor par use kiya ja sakta hai naye customers ko attract karne ke liye, lekin har ek ke apne unique benefits hain. Webinars audience ke sath engage karne ka aur apne product ya service ka live demonstration dene ka behtareen tareeqa hain. Ye potential customers se sawalat ka jawab dene aur feedback lene ka moqa bhi dete hain. Dusri taraf, ebooks banane mein kam mehnat lagti hai aur ye apke products aur services ke bare mein detailed information asaan samajh aane wale format mein provide kar sakte hain. instruction: Diye gaye event ki tafseelon ka khulasa karte hue aik Wikipedia page likhiye.
input: Great Chicago Fire
output: The Great Chicago Fire aik conflagration tha jo American city Chicago, Illinois mein October 8 se October 10, 1871 tak jalta raha. Is aag mein 300 tak log mare gaye, city ka taqreeban 3.3 square miles hissa tabah ho gaya, aur 100,000 se zyada log beghaar ho gaye. Aag ki wajah maloom nahi, lekin yeh Mrs. O'Leary ki milkiyat ke aik chhote barn mein shuru hui aur tez hawaon ki madad se jaldi phail gayi. Aag ne andazan 17,450 buildings tabah kar diye, andazan 100,000 logon ko beghaar kar diya aur andazan $200 million ka nuksaan kiya. United States history mein sabse bure disasters mein se aik hone ke bawajood, is aag ne city ko dobara banane mein madad ki aur naye building codes banwaye, jis mein city ke ird gird bade firebreaks ka construction shamil tha jo shayad ise mazeed tabahi se bacha sakta tha. Yeh Chicago ki badi population growth mein aik ahem factor tha jis ne 1890 tak city ko nation mein doosre number ka sabse bara bana diya.

instruction: Koi topic choose kariye aur us par 200 words ke 3 paragraphs likhiye
input: Topic: Global Warming ke Asbab
output:
Global warming aaj duniya ke samne ek existential khathra hai. Yeh atmosphere mein greenhouse gases ke buildup se hota hai jo global average temperatures mein izafa ka baais banta hai, jis se climate patterns, sea levels, aur extreme weather events mein tabdeeliyaan aati hain. Anthropogenic greenhouse gases ki aksar miqdar fossil fuels ke jalane, deforestation, aur dusri human activities se aati hai jo atmosphere mein carbon dioxide release karti hain.

Fossil fuels global warming mein sabse bara contributing factor hain. Jab yeh fuels jalaye jate hain, to unka stored carbon, carbon dioxide aur dusre pollutants ke tor par release hota hai, jo atmosphere mein heat trap karte hain aur global temperature badhate hain. Yeh aage ek vicious cycle ka baais banta hai jahan zyada carbon release hota hai jo mazeed warming ka sabab banta hai. Long-term anthropogenic impacts ke alawa, natural events jaise volcanic eruptions aur Earth ke orbit mein tabdeeliyaan warming ka baais ban sakti hain, lekin yeh processes bohat zyada waqt lete hain aur isliye current rapid global warming ke asbab nahi hain.

Global warming ke effects wide-reaching hain aur duniya bhar mein climate mein shadeed tabdeeliyaan la sakte hain. Misal ke tor par, badhte temperatures polar ice caps ko pighlane ka baais ban sakte hain, jo rising sea levels aur coastal regions ke inundating ka sabab bante hain. Is ke alawa, extreme weather conditions zyada aam ho jayenge, jo deadly floods, droughts aur dusre weather-related disasters ka baais banenge. Zyada pareshani ki baat yeh hai ke global warming environment mein abrupt aur irreversible changes trigger kar sakta hai, jo global climate, economy aur human health par significant detrimental effects rakh sakte hain. Isliye, global warming ke impact ko kam karne ke liye global carbon emissions kam karne ke liye zyada proactive measures lene ki zarurat hai.

instruction: Article content ka mukhtasar khulasa 100 words se kam mein pesh kariye.
input: Whales ek wasi tor par phele hue aur mukhtalif qism ke mukammal aquatic placental marine mammals ka group hain. Ye infraorder Cetacea ke andar ek ghair rasmi grouping hain, jo aksar dolphins aur porpoises ko exclude karta hai. Whales, dolphins aur porpoises order Cetartiodactyla se belong karte hain, jo even-toed ungulates par mushtamil hai. Unke sabse qareeb non-cetacean zinda relatives hippopotamuses hain, jin se ye aur dusre cetaceans taqriban 54 million saal pehle diverge hue the.
output:
Whales aquatic mammals ki aik dilchasp species hain jo millions years se موجود hain. Ye infraorder Cetacea aur order Cetartiodactyla se belong karte hain, aur inke closest non-cetacean relatives hippopotamuses hain. Whales ko 8 families mein divide kiya gaya hai, jin mein se har aik ke apne unique features aur adaptations hain. Yeh article whales aur unki evolution over time ka comprehensive overview فراہم karta hai.

Yeh kai wajoohat ki wajah se ho sakta hai, jaise ke misconfiguration, high traffic ki wajah se server overload, application ke coding aur logic mein issues, ya server ke hardware ya operating system mein koi problem. Issue ko troubleshoot karne ke liye, yeh zaroori hai ke application aur server logs ko dekha jaye taake pata chal sake ke error ka sabab kya hai. Sabab identify karne ke baad, problem ko fix kiya ja sakta hai aur error resolve ho jana chahiye.

instruction: Apni pasand ke kisi specific topic ke bare mein 5 questions aur un ke corresponding answers ki list banayiye.
input: Chemical Engineering
output:
1. Chemical Engineering kya hai? 
Answer: Chemical engineering physical science, mathematics aur economics ka application hai jo processes ko design, develop aur optimize karne ke liye hai taake chemicals, materials, aur energy ko safely produce aur use kiya ja sake.

2. Chemical engineers typically kis qism ke projects par kaam karte hain? 
Answer: Chemical engineers typically large-scale energy production, chemical process design aur optimization, materials development, aur pharmaceuticals, food aur drinks, aur dusre consumer goods ke production aur manufacture se related projects par kaam karte hain.

3. Chemical engineer banne ke liye kya qualifications required hain? 
Answer: Aik chemical engineer ko typically kam se kam Chemical Engineering mein Bachelor's degree chahiye, although kuch universities is field mein postgraduate degrees bhi offer karti hain.
         
4. Chemical engineers ke liye career prospects kya hain? 
Answer: Petrochemical, pharmaceutical, biotechnology, aur environmental industries mein chemical engineers ki high demand hai, saath hi academia, research, aur government entities mein bhi.

5. Chemical engineers ko kya skills chahiye?
Answer: Chemical engineers ko solid problem solving aur analytical skills chahiye, saath hi physical sciences, mathematics aur economics ki understanding bhi. Unhe materials ko manufacturing ya transform karne ke liye, ya existing ones ko improve karne ke liye processes research, design aur develop karne ki zarurat hoti hai. Communication skills, verbal aur written dono, bhi important hain.

instruction: Diye gaye methodology ke peeche ki philosophy ki tafseel kariye.
input: Agile Methodology
output: Agile Methodology aik project management approach hai jo collaboration, flexibility aur ongoing improvement par zor deta hai. Yeh is idea par based hai ke teams aur individuals ko autonomy di jani chahiye ke woh apne solutions banayein aur apne kaam ki ownership lein. Agile Methodology aik iterative approach ko bhi promote karta hai, jis mein teams idea se development tak jaldi move karti hain aur apni mistakes se seekhti hain, raaste mein chhotey adjustments karti hain. Yeh process repeatable aur easily adapted hone ke liye design kiya gaya hai, jo teams ko user feedback ke base par tasks aur techniques adjust karne ki ijazat deta hai. Ultimately, Agile Methodology teams ko innovative products aur services banane ki ijazat deta hai jo customers ki needs ko pura karte hain.

instruction: Diye gaye character aur theme ke gird bachon ki aik original story likhiye.
input:
Character: Sam the Rabbit
Theme: Fear
output:
Ek zamane mein, Sam naam ka ek rabbit rehta tha. Sam hamesha se ek bahadur aur tujassus wala rabbit tha, jo kabhi koi nayi cheez try karne se nahi darta tha. Lekin ek din, kuch aisa hua jo Sam ko bahut dar gaya.

Sam ne ek khatarnak jungle ke bare mein suna tha jise kabhi kisi ne explore karne ki himmat nahi ki thi. Uske friends ne use wahan se dur rehne ki warning di thi, lekin apne dar ke bawajood, Sam ne jane ka faisla kiya. Akhir, usne socha, woh kaise bahadur ho sakta hai agar woh try karne se hi dar jaye?

Toh Sam apne safar par nikal gaya, uska dil tez dhadak raha tha aur uska dimagh dar bhari sochon se bhara hua tha. Lekin, jaise jaise woh apne safar par aage badhta gaya, Sam ne himmat jama li aur uska dar khatam hone laga. Woh jungle ke aadhe raste tak pahunch gaya, lekin achanak, usne ek zor aur darawni awaz suni. Sam dar ke mare jam gaya.

Lekin phir, kuch aur bhi unexpected hua.

Kahin se, ek fluffy white pup andheron se aa gaya. Sam apne bharosemand companion ko dekh kar bahut khush hua, aur pup ki mojoodgi ne use himmat aur tasalli di. Pup ki madad se, Sam apne dar par qaboo pa gaya aur apna safar mukammal kar diya.

Sam ne aakhir kar woh pa liya tha jo woh dhund raha tha - forbidden treasure waaqai real tha. Lekin shayad isse bhi zyada ahem baat yeh thi ke Sam ne himmat aur friendship pa li thi, jo koi treasure nahi kharid sakta.

instruction: Apni pasand ke character ke bare mein aik chhoti story likhiye.
input: Character: Adele the Fox
output:
Adele the Fox aik chalak aur shaitaan janwar tha. Woh raat ko murghiyon ke ghar mein chup kar ghusta tha aur din mein sabziyon ke baghon ko loot leta tha. Adele ke chori karne ke tareeqon ne use acha khila rakha tha, lekin uska sabse bara adventure abhi baki tha.

Aik din, Adele ne suna ke jungle ke andar kahi gehrai mein aik secret treasure chhupa hua hai. Uski adventure loving spirit jagah gayi, aur Adele us treasure ko dhundne ke mission par nikal pada. Woh tedhi medhi raahon se gaya aur khatarnak dariyaon ko paar kiya, lekin kuch bhi use treasure tak nahi le ja raha tha.

Jab Adele haar manne wala tha, usne aik awaaz suni jo use pukaar rahi thi. Woh mud kar dekha to aik budhi fairy godmother thi, jo meharbani se muskurayi aur kaha: "Tumhara treasure tumhare andar hai, Adele. Yeh koi aisi cheez nahi jo tum dhundo, balke kuch aisa hai jo tumhare paas pehle se hai. Tumhein bas apne aap par bharosa karna hai."

Adele thoda confused tha, lekin uske safar ne use aik qeemti sabaq sikhaya tha: ke himmat aur determination uske apne sabse bare treasure the. Us din ke baad, Adele ne zindagi ke challenges ko naye self-belief ke saath tackle kiya aur kabhi apne sapnon ko chhorna nahi.

instruction: Diye gaye topic par aik argumentative essay likhiye.
input: Topic: Homeschooling ke Fayde
output:
Homeschooling un parents ke liye aik tezi se popular hone wala option ban raha hai jo apne bachon ko quality education provide karna chahte hain. Yeh kai fayde pesh karta hai jo ise traditional school settings ka aik viable alternative banate hain, jismein flexibility, curriculum par control, aur learning ki personalization shamil hai.

Homeschooling ka pehla faida flexibility hai. Homeschooling families apna khud ka curriculum pick aur choose kar sakte hain, jo parents ko un topics aur subjects choose karne ki ijazat deta hai jo unke bachon ke liye set kiye gaye goals ke saath perfectly align karte hain. Learning ko individual student ki needs ke mutabiq bhi tailored kiya ja sakta hai, jo bachon ko apni khud ki pace mein progress karne aur un areas ko detail mein explore karne ki ijazat deta hai jin mein unki interest hai. Flexibility ka aik aur benefit yeh hai ke classes ko years ki bajaye weeks ya months mein liya ja sakta hai, jo students ko faster progress karne ki ijazat deta hai.

Homeschooling ka aik aur major advantage yeh hai ke yeh parents ko increased level ka control offer karta hai. Homeschooling parents decide kar sakte hain ke woh kya topics cover karna chahte hain, jaise religion ya science, aur woh unhe kaise cover karna chahte hain. Yeh unhe apne values ya belief systems ko apne child ki education mein weave karne ki ijazat deta hai. Additionally, homeschooling ki individualized nature ka matlab yeh hai ke parents ko apna khud ka schedule set karne aur decide karne ki freedom hai ke unke children ko kab break lena chahiye.

Aakhir mein, homeschooling learning ki personalization enable karta hai. Parents apne child ki needs ke mutabiq tailored environment create kar sakte hain, jo unhe apne child ki strengths aur weaknesses par focus karne ki ijazat deta hai. Yeh children ko zyada effectively learn karne aur un areas ko build up karne mein madad kar sakta hai jahan woh struggle kar rahe hain. Un children ke liye jinhe ADHD ya dyslexia jaise difficulties hain, homeschooling additional strategies aur resources bhi offer karta hai jo unhe apne challenges overcome karne mein madad karte hain.

Conclusion mein, homeschooling un parents ke liye aik incredibly beneficial option ho sakta hai jo apne children ko best possible education provide karne ki talash mein hain. Yeh flexibility, control, aur personalization offer karta hai jo traditional schools simply offer nahi kar sakte.

input: Vegetarian diet ke sehat ke fayde
output: Vegetarian diet apnane ke bahut se fayde hain. Yeh na sirf meat products khane se jude health risks ko khatam karta hai, jaise ke fat aur cholesterol ke high levels jo heart disease ka baais ban sakte hain, balke yeh kuch qisam ke cancer ka risk bhi kam karta hai. Vegetarian diet fiber, vitamins, aur minerals se bhi bharpur hota hai, jo yeh ensure karne mein madad karta hai ke koi shakhs apni sehat ke liye zaruri tamam nutrients hasil kar raha hai. Studies mein yeh bhi paya gaya hai ke jo log vegan diet follow karte hain unka body mass index kam hota hai aur unhe type 2 diabetes hone ka risk bhi kam hota hai. Saaf baat yeh hai ke vegetarian diet se jude health benefits itne ziada hain ke unhe ignore karna mushkil hai.

instruction: Aik product design guide output kariye jo samajhne mein aasan ho
input: AI aur robotics ke saath tech product ke liye design guide jo cartoon theme ke saath ho
output:
Yeh guide developers ki madad ke liye design kiya gaya hai taake woh aik aisa product bana sakein jo AI aur Robotics dono ko seamlessly integrate kare, aur saath hi visually appealing cartoon theme bhi ho.

Pehle, jab shuru kar rahe hain, to yeh zaroori hai ke final product kaisa dikhna chahiye iska idea hasil karna. Storyboard banana key components aur product ke andar interactions ko map out karne mein madad kar sakta hai. Storyboarding mein comic ki personality aur context ko dhyan mein rakhna chahiye, taake yeh pakka ho sake ke product out of place na lage.

Doosre, jab product build kar rahe hain, to progressive design process use karna zaroori hai. Simplistic designs se shuru karke, har iteration ke saath slowly complexity add karte jaana. Yeh approach ensure karega ke product ke tamam components complete ho sakein aur potential issues se bach sakein.

Aakhir mein, yeh zaror consider karein ke product ko different users kaise use kar sakte hain. Yeh scenarios aur prototypes banane se kiya ja sakta hai jo test kiye ja sakein. Yeh problems identify karne aur feedback provide karne mein madad karega.
Product ko test karna developers ke workflow ka aik ahem hissa hai, kyunke yeh developers ko apni creations ko public ke liye release karne se pehle fine-tune karne ki ijazat deta hai.

Bahut se comedians ko guzara karne ke liye apne social circle par bhari bharosa karna parta hai aur agar job zyada demanding sabit ho to woh loneliness aur alienation ka shikar ho sakte hain. instruction: Kisi diye gaye industry par disruptive technology ke impact par discuss kariye.

output: Media industry ne consumers ke content ke saath interact karne ke tareeke mein bohat bara shift dekha hai, jo zyada tar disruptive technology ke introduction ki wajah se hua hai. Is technology ne content tak aasan access ki suvidha di hai, jo aksar access ki cost kam kar deti hai. Is ke alawa, disruptive technology se hasil hone wali interactivity ne storytelling ke naye formats banaye hain, jaise ke virtual reality aur augmented reality ka istemal. Is ke saath saath, analytics ka istemal media industry ko apne audiences ko behtar samajhne aur zyada personalized content ke saath adapt karne mein madad kiya hai.

instruction: Diye gaye app ki usability ka jaiza liye.

Iska simple, intuitive design hai intuitive navigation ke saath, aur iska powerful search function kisi bhi information ko dhundna aasan banata hai jo aapko chahiye. Overall, Evernote organized aur productive rehne ke liye aik excellent tool hai.

instruction: Do haal hi ke digital marketing campaigns ki effectiveness ka jaiza liye.

Campaigns ki reach ka analysis karna chahiye ye dekhne ke liye ke target audience mein kitne log advertisement ke samne aaye. Advertisement ke saath engagement ko bhi dekhna chahiye, jaise ke likes, comments, shares, aur koi aur interactions. Aakhir mein, conversion rate ko dekhna chahiye ye evaluate karne ke liye ke campaigns kitni effective theen sales ya leads drive karne mein.

instruction: Diye gaye option ke fayde aur nuqsanat ki wazahat kariye.
input: Drupal use karte hue web application banayiye
output:
Drupal use kar ke web application banana ke kai fayde hain. Yeh widely use hota hai, jis se developers dhundna asaan ho jata hai jo is ke saath experience rakhte hain, aur is ke paas free modules ki bari range hai jo quick development aur customizations ki ijazat deti hai. Additionally, Drupal scalable aur secure hai, jo web application ke badhne ke saath expansion ki ijazat deta hai.

Lekin, is ke kuch downsides bhi hain. Drupal seekhna mushkil ho sakta hai, aur is ko customize karna bohat time aur effort le sakta hai. Additionally, kyunki yeh itna widely use hota hai, yeh hackers ki taraf se malicious attacks ke liye vulnerable ho sakta hai.

Jaise jaise story zinda hoti hai, transitions aur setting descriptions use kariye sequences ko break karne ke liye aur story ko aage badhane ke liye. Akhir mein, climax use kariye yeh dikhane ke liye ke characters kis cheez ke liye koshish kar rahe the aur unke actions kaise aik satisfying endpoint mein result hue hain.
output: Aik story ka shuruaat aik idea se honi chahiye aur characters, settings, aur plot ka istemal karte hue use zinda karna chahiye illustrations, captions, dialogues, aur setting descriptions ka istemal karte hue. instruction: Diye gaye poem ka tahleel kariye.
input: "The Road Not Taken" by Robert Frost
output: "The Road Not Taken" Robert Frost ka aik poem hai jo aik musafir ke bare mein hai jo zindagi mein aik mushkil faisla karne ka samna kar raha hai. Musafir ko faisla karna hai ke do raston mein se kaun sa rasta le, dono raaste barabar ghise hue aur barabar dilkash nazar aa rahe hain. Musafir akhir mein kam safar kiye gaye raste ko leta hai kyunke us mein zyada sambhavna hai aur zyada mauke milte hain. Poem ye suggest karta hai ke zindagi choices se bhari hai aur ye zaroori hai ke samajhdari se choose karein. Ye bhi suggest karta hai ke zaroori hai ke zindagi mein adventurous banein aur risks lein. Poem aik yaad dilaane ka kaam karta hai ke jo choices hum zindagi mein karte hain unke serious consequences ho sakte hain. Humein apne actions ki zimmedari leni chahiye aur apni zindagi ke safar ka behtar se behtar faida uthane ki koshish karni chahiye.

instruction: Do mukhtalif books mein metaphors ke istemaal ka muqaysa aur farq kariye.
input: "The Catcher in the Rye" by J.D. Salinger aur "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald
output: "The Catcher in the Rye" by J.D. Salinger aur "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald mein metaphors ka istemaal bohat farq hai. "The Catcher in the Rye" mein, metaphors Holden Caulfield ke liye apne khayal aur insaniyat ke bare mein apne tasawwurat ko behtar tarike se bayaan karne ka zariya hain. Woh aksar metaphors ka istemaal apni zindagi aur doosron ki zindagi ke darmiyan muqaysa karne ke liye karta hai - misal ke tor par, woh apne aap ko "catcher in the rye" se tashbeeh deta hai jo bachon ko cliff se girne se bachata hai. "The Great Gatsby" by F. Scott Fitzgerald mein, metaphors Gatsby ke ird gird aik jadui mahol paida karne aur uske na hasil hone wale khwabon aur uske aur Daisy ke darmiyan na hasil hone wale ishq ke tasawwur par zor dene ke liye istemaal hote hain. Gatsby ko bar bar "mythical figure" ke tor par bayaan kiya gaya hai, jo uski zindagi se bhi bari shakhsiyat ko zahir karta hai, jo baad mein aik jhooth sabit hota hai. Is ke ilawa, Daisy ke dock ke akhir mein green light us na hasil hone wale ishq ke khwab ki nishani hai jiska Gatsby peecha kar raha hai.

instruction: Diye gaye newspaper article ka khulasa kariye
input: Kya Wearable Technology loneliness se ladne mein madad kar sakti hai?
output: Aik haal hi ke newspaper article mein, loneliness ka masla aur wearable technology kaise iske alleviation mein role ada kar sakti hai is par discussion ki gayi thi. Wearable technology devices chhotay gadgets hain jo hamare bodies se connected hote hain, jo kai physiological parameters measure karne ke liye use ho sakte hain aur is tarah hamare physical aur mental health ko track kar sakte hain. Yeh suggest kiya gaya tha ke wearable technology loneliness prevent karne ke liye use ho sakti hai hamare physical movements monitor kar ke aur hamare isolation ke levels track kar ke. Furthermore, article mein kaha gaya tha ke wearable technology hamein hamare current feelings of loneliness ke bare mein inform karne ke liye use ho sakti hai, aur hamein tips provide kar sakti hai ke doosron ke saath kaise connect karna hai. Finally, article mein argue kiya gaya tha ke aisi technology lonely feel karne ke risks aur overall health par iske implications ke bare mein awareness raise karne ke liye bhi use ho sakti hai.

instruction: Kisi diye gaye tradition ki origin ki tafseel kariye
input: Thanksgiving Day Parade
output: Thanksgiving Day Parade 1924 mein shuru hua, jab Macy's ke employees ne New York City ki sadkon mein parade kiya aur paper-mache aur papier-mâché se bane bade janwar pakde hue the. Yeh tamasha hit tha, aur Macy's ne akhir kar ise expand kiya taake clowns, floats, bands, aur bilkul Santa Claus ki traditional arrival shamil ho sake. Parade har saal jari raha, lekin World War II ke dauran suspend ho gaya. Yeh 1945 mein dobara shuru hua, aur tab se ek annual tradition ban gaya hai.

instruction: Do diye gaye data structures ke darmiyan farq ki wazahat kariye
input: Arrays aur linked lists
output: Arrays aur linked lists dono linear data structures hain, lekin ye kai ahem tareeqon mein farq rakhte hain. Arrays data items ko contiguous memory locations par store karte hain aur items ko access karne ke liye indexes use karte hain. Array mein items ka same type hona zaroori hai, aur ye constant time mein access ho sakte hain. Linked lists, doosri taraf, data items ko non-contiguous memory locations par store karte hain aur items ko access karne ke liye links use karte hain. Linked lists heterogeneous data types ki ijazat dete hain aur linear time mein traverse ho sakte hain. Is ke alawa, linked lists zyada dynamic hain, kyunke ye aasani se grow aur shrink ho sakte hain, jabke arrays zyada static hain aur agar list bahut badi ho jaye to kisi qism ki resizing ki zaroorat hoti hai.

instruction: Computer-based education system ke effects par aik study ka summary likhiye
input: Is study ne primary school students ko mathematics sikhane ke liye web-based learning system use karne ke effects ko explore kiya.
output: Yeh study primary school students ki mathematics achievement par Computer-Assisted Instruction (CAI) ke effects par focus karti hai. Is study mein pre-test post-test control group design use kiya gaya hai do labeled groups ke saath: aik treatment group jis mein students CAI system use kar rahe hain aur aik control group jo traditional instruction receive kar raha hai. Results ne indicate kiya hai ke CAI ka students ki mathematics achievement par positive effect hai, jo traditional instruction ke muqable mein zyada mathematics performance ki taraf le jata hai. Is liye yeh study confirm karti hai ke CAI ka use primary school students ko mathematics sikhane ke liye beneficial ho sakta hai.

instruction: Aik software program ke liye product review likhiye

output: Yeh grammar-checking tool un logon ke liye aik behtareen option hai jo apni writing improve karna chahte hain. Yeh use karna aasan hai aur jaldi results deta hai, written English mein grammar errors check aur correct karne ki ability ke saath. Is mein bahut sare features hain jo ise writers, editors, aur academics ke liye equally invaluable banate hain. Overall, yeh un sab ke liye aik great product hai jo apni writing mein accurate aur perfect grammar ensure karna chahte hain.

instruction: Naye technology ko introduce karne ke liye aik plan banayiye
input: Naya technology aik robotic assistant hai jo customer service aur retail operations mein madad karta hai.
output:
Customer service aur retail operations mein madad ke liye robotic assistant ka introduction aik mushkil kaam ho sakta hai, lekin dhyan se planning ke saath, yeh kamyab ho sakta hai. Is process mein consider karne ke liye kuch steps hain:

1. Research: Technology ki research kariye aur uski capabilities ko samjhiye taki aap jaan sakein ke ise kaise behtar tarike se deploy karna hai.
2. Test: Technology ko controlled environment mein test kariye aur yaqeeni banayiye ke yeh real world mein istemal ke liye tayyar hai.
3. Implement: Technology ko desired environment mein install kariye aur employees ko train karna shuru kariye ke ise kaise use karna hai.
4. Monitor: Technology aur uski performance ko regularly monitor kariye taki koi potential issues identify kar sakein jo paida ho sakein.
5. Evaluate: Technology ki success ko evaluate kariye aur zarurat ke mutabiq koi changes ya modifications kariye.

output:
Ingredients:
- 500g spaghetti
- 4 tablespoons olive oil
- 4 garlic cloves, minced
- 2 eggs
- 2 egg yolks
- 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
- Salt
- Pepper

Instructions:
1. Aik bara pot namkeen paani ka ubaal laayiye. Spaghetti daal kar al dente tak pakayiye.
2. Is dauran, aik bare skillet mein olive oil ko medium-high heat par garam kariye. Garlic daal kar taqreeban 1 minute tak khushboo aane tak pakayiye.
3. Aik alag bowl mein eggs, egg yolks, Parmesan cheese, aur thoda sa salt aur pepper ko whisk kariye.
4. Pake hue spaghetti ko drain kariye aur foran garlic wale skillet mein daal diye.
5. Egg mixture daal kar mix kariye. Lagatar hilate hue taqreeban 2 minute tak pakayiye jab tak eggs set na ho jayen.
6. Spaghetti Carbonara ko foran serve kariye additional Parmesan cheese aur black pepper ke saath, agar chahen. Enjoy!

instruction: Dinner item ke liye aik culinary recipe banayiye.
input: Dish: Egg Roll
output:
Ingredients: 
- 2 cups shredded cabbage
- 1 cup shredded carrot
- 2 cloves garlic, minced
- 4 scallions, chopped
- 1/4 teaspoon ground ginger
- 2 tablespoons soy sauce
- 1 teaspoon sesame oil
- 1/2 pound ground pork
- 6 egg roll wrappers
- 2 tablespoons vegetable oil

Instructions:
1. Vegetable oil ko large skillet mein medium heat par garam kariye. Garlic, scallions, aur ginger add kariye aur khushbu aane tak pakayiye, taqriban 1 minute.
2. Pork, cabbage, aur carrot add kariye. Pork brown hone tak pakayiye, taqriban 5 minutes.
3. Soy sauce aur sesame oil add kariye. Additional 2 minutes tak pakayiye.
4. Har egg roll wrapper par filling ka aik heaping tablespoon rakhiye. Roll up kariye aur edges ko thoda sa pani se seal kariye.
5. Deep skillet mein vegetable oil ko medium-high heat par garam kariye. Egg rolls ko batches mein golden brown hone tak fry kariye, har side taqriban 2 minutes.
6. Egg rolls ko garam serve kariye apni favorite dipping sauce ke sath. Enjoy!

input:

Article 2: https://www.nytimes.com/2020/10/19/world/europe/greece-migrant-rescue.html
output: Dono articles Europe mein current migrant aur refugee crisis par focus karte hain. Pehle article mein, crisis ko Turkish perspective se address kiya gaya hai. Article us mulk ki koshishon ka outline karta hai jo Syria, Iraq, aur Afghanistan se aane wale migrants ki tadad ko rokne ke liye ki gayi hain. Is ke alawa, article garmiyon mein boat travelers ki barh rahi tadad ko dekhta hai jo Turkey se Greek islands tak ka passage lene ki koshish kar rahe hain. Dusra article crisis ko Greek perspective se dekhta hai. Yeh Greek authorities ke actions ko address karta hai, jaise ke Aegean Sea mein patrols aur refugee camps mein zyada efficient dismissal processing implement karna. Is ke alawa, article Greek rescue ship, Dia Nefsi, ke operations ko examine karta hai, jo sea par rescue operations mein madad karta hai. Do mukhtalif perspectives ke bawajood, dono articles is baat par agree karte hain ke Europe mein migrant aur refugee crisis ko address karna zaroori hai.

instruction: Sawalat ka jawab diye aur wazahat provide kariye.
input: Algorithm kya hai?
output:
Algorithm ek set hai instructions aur rules ka jo kisi issue ko solve karne, data process karne, aur doosre computing tasks complete karne ke liye use hote hain. Yeh steps ke sequence se bana hota hai jo jab sahi tarike se follow kiye jayen to desired output ya goal produce karta hai. Algorithms computers, mathematics, aur study ke doosre fields mein use hote hain complex problems ke reliable aur repeatable solutions provide karne ke liye. Steps ke set ko effectively carry out kar ke, algorithms time save karne mein madad kar sakte hain aur calculations ko bahut easier bana sakte hain. For example, ek sorting algorithm use kiya ja sakta hai items ki list ko highest se lowest (ya vice versa) quickly sort karne ke liye, har item ko baaki sab se compare kar ke aur ek ek kar ke sort karne ke bajaye.

Computer science mein, algorithms ko computer ko instructions provide karne ke process ke taur par socha ja sakta hai kisi given problem ko solve karne ke liye. Computer science ke kayi problems jaise ke list mein koi item search karna, sorting, ya do points ke beech shortest path dhundna algorithms use kar ke solve kiye ja sakte hain.

instruction: Diye gaye problem ko solve karne ka tareeqa banayiye.
input: Data silos kaise kam kariye.
output: Data silos ko kam karne ka aik tareeqa data harmonization approach ka istemal karna hai, jis mein mukhtalif datasets ko standardize karna, align karna, aur consolidate kar ke aik single, unified dataset banana shamil hai. Yeh data silos ke banane se bachne mein madad karta hai jo ke mehnga errors, ghair mufeed processes, aur effort ki duplication ka baais ban sakte hain. Mazeed yeh ke, jab data mapping ka istemal kiya jata hai yeh ensure karne ke liye ke data elements sync mein hain, toh yeh data ko zyada asani se accessible bana sakta hai aur organization mein single source of truth ka kaam kar sakta hai.

instruction: Diye gaye prompt ke base par mujhe aik kahani sunayiye
input: Aik jawaan soldier jang se ghar wapas aata hai
output:
Soldier mahino baad bahar se ghar wapas aaya, umeed kar raha tha ke khushi se bhare family aur friends uska istiqbal karenge. Lekin uske bajaye, use khamoshi ne welcome kiya. Uski aankhein sadak ke ek taraf se doosri taraf ghoomeen, umeed kar raha tha ke yeh udaas manzar sirf ek garm aur khushgawar reunion ka pardah hai, lekin uske andar kuch nahi hila. Uska dil pareshan tha jab woh dhire dhire cobblestone path par chalta hua darwaze se andar gaya.

Woh ghar mein dakhil hua, un jaane pehchane chehron ko dhoondte hue jinhe dekhne ki uski shadeed khwahish thi, lekin sab kuch khali aur ajnabi lag raha tha. Soldier ne ghar mein kisi ko dhoondte hue apni talash ka daaira barha diya, lekin koi ghar mein nahi tha. Woh dhire dhire upar gaya aur apne bachpan ke kamre mein dakhil hua. Khidki se bahar jhaankते hue, usne logon ka ek group dekha, uski family aur friends, garden mein baat cheet kar rahe the.

Soldier dhire dhire un ki taraf badha, uska dil zor se dhadak raha tha aur uski nazar ek shakhs se doosre par ja rahi thi. Jaise hi woh qareeb aaya, ek lamhe ke liye ajeeb si khamoshi chhayi, phir bheed zordaar taaliyon aur khushi ke naaron mein phat padi. Sab ne use gher liya, use gale lagaya, aankhon mein khushi aur mسرت ke aansu the.

Soldier ghar aa gaya tha.

output: Larki aur uska naya dost alag na hone wale ban gaye aur har jagah saath jaate aur sab kuch saath karte the. Saalon baad, woh dono college gaye, lekin unhon ne lambe faaslon par bheje gaye khatoot ke zariye rabta rakha, hamesha ek doosre ko tasalli dete aur zaroorat ke waqt hausla afzai karte rahe. instruction: Is kaam ko implement karne ke liye step-by-step guide banayiye.
input: Naye employees ke liye aik effective onboarding process banana
output:
Step 1: Naye employees ki onboarding ke liye saaf goals set kariye. Is bare mein sochiye ke aap apne naye hires mein kis qism ka knowledge aur skills chahte hain aur unhe hasil karne mein madad ke liye plan banayiye.

Step 2: Naye employees ki onboarding ke liye zaruri resources aur processes ki pehchan kariye. Tasks aur activities ka timeline develop kariye jo naye hires ko apne roles mein proficient banne ke liye complete karna hoga.

Step 3: Welcome package banayiye jis mein company policies, procedures, aur culture ke bare mein information ho.

Step 4: Mentor program establish kariye jo naye hires ko experienced employees ke saath pair kare. Yeh unhe sawal puchhne, expectations aur tasks mein insights hasil karne, aur relationships develop karne ki ijazat deta hai.

Step 5: Training program implement kariye jo role mein success ke liye zaruri skills aur knowledge ke mutabiq tailored ho.

Step 6: Naye hires ko current employees ko shadow karne dijiye taake processes aur procedures ki gehri samajh hasil kar sakein.

Step 7: Naye hires ke saath regular check-ins schedule kariye taake unki progress gauge kar sakein aur feedback aur guidance offer kar sakein.

Step 8: Yeh ensure kariye ke naye hires ke paas success ke liye zaruri tools aur resources mojood hain.

Step 9: Naye hires ki successes celebrate kariye aur team ki accomplishments ke liye recognition provide kariye.

instruction: Diye gaye product ko promote karne ke liye aik campaign develop kariye.
input: XBox Elite Series 2
output:
1. Streaming platforms jaise ke Youtube, Twitch, aur Hulu par advertisements ka series banayiye jo product ko action mein aur uske features ko dikhaye.
2. Key influencers aur gaming personalities se rabta kariye taake product ke features aur fayde communicate kar sakein.
3. Social media par user reviews aur recommendations compile aur share kariye.
4. Product ke liye aik web page banayiye jahan potential customers Xbox Elite Series 2 aur dusre gaming controllers ke beech features compare kar sakein.
5. Industry experts ko feature karte hue aik video series banayiye jo Xbox Elite Series 2 ke pros aur cons discuss karein.
6. Aik giveaway campaign launch kariye jo logon ko product purchase karne ke liye incentivize kare.
7. Reddit aur Discord par select communities se rabta kariye taake word spread kar sakein.
8. Xbox Elite Series 2 use karne ke tips aur guides ke bare mein articles feature karte hue aik blog campaign launch kariye.
9. Industry-related newsletters ke saath email campaigns chalayiye jo product ke features highlight karein.

instruction: Diye gaye theory ko test karne ke liye aik scientific experiment banayiye.
input: Kya water molecules mukhtalif shapes bana sakte hain?
output:
Scientific experiment mein ye steps shamil hone chahiye:

1. Aik얕은 container hasil kariye, jaise ke Pyrex dish.
2. Container mein paani rakhiye aur temperature thoda kam kariye taake paani ke molecules slow ho jayen.
3. Container ke center mein food coloring ka aik drop rakhiye aur droplet ko dhyan se observe kariye.
4. Jab paani ke molecules droplet ke paas ayen, Pyrex dish ko ahista ahista rotate kariye taake dekh sakiye ke droplet kaise paani ke molecules se ghira hua hai aur kya ye koi distinct shapes ya patterns banate hain.
5. Observations ke notes liye aur koi significant results record kariye.

Experiment ke zariye, aap different shapes ki formation observe kar sakte hain jo paani ke molecules ke food coloring droplet ko surround karne ke result mein banti hain.

1783: Treaty of Paris sign hota hai, jo officially American Revolutionary War khatam karta hai.

instruction: Renewable energy kaise environmental pollution kam kar sakti hai?
input:
I understand my role as a Professional English to Roman Urdu Translator. I'm ready to translate English text into Roman Urdu while:

- Preserving standard English terms (educational, technology, professional terms, etc.)
- Maintaining original formatting and structure
- Using proper Roman Urdu phonetics
- Ensuring natural flow for Roman Urdu speakers
- Outputting only in the specified JSON format

However, I notice that no English text has been provided for translation (the input shows "<noinput>"). Please provide the English text you'd like me to translate into Roman Urdu, and I'll return it in the required JSON format.
output: Renewable energy sources jaise ke solar, wind aur hydropower environmental pollution kam karne mein madad kar sakte hain kyunke ye wahi toxic substances paida nahi karte jo traditional sources of energy karte hain, jaise ke fossil fuels. Ye renewable energy sources bahut kam ya bilkul greenhouse gases paida nahi karte, jo global warming aur climate change ke asli contributors hain. Traditional sources of energy ko renewable sources se replace kar ke, hum air pollution aur uske related health problems kam kar sakte hain, jaise ke asthma aur lung disease. Additionally, renewable energy sources mein water pollution kam karne ki potential hai kyunke ye typically zyada efficient, non-industrial aur non-chemical forms of production par rely karte hain.

instruction: Text ki string ko teen paragraphs mein taqseem kariye, har paragraph mein kam az kam paanch sentences hon.
input: Woh hamesha adventure ki talash mein rehti thi. Usay yeh saat samandaron mein sailing ke roop mein mila. Khatarnak toofan aur dhokhebaaz creatures thay, lekin usne kabhi haar nahi maani.
output:
Paragraph 1: 
Woh hamesha adventure ki talash mein rehti thi, kuch aisa jo usse excite kare aur use zinda mehsoos karae. Usne ye saat samundron mein sailing ke roop mein paya, exploration aur discovery ka safar. Woh determination aur enthusiasm ke saath rawana hui, kabhi nahi janti thi ke kya milega. Uska courage mazboot tha aur uska dil bahadur tha, aur jaise hi woh har naye horizon ko explore karti, woh kabhi haar na manne ka faisla kar chuki thi.

Paragraph 2:
Samundron ne kuch khatarnak toofan aur dhokhebaaz creatures pesh kiye, lekin woh kabhi bhi apne courage aur determination mein nahi jhuki. Usne apni aankhein apne goal par focused rakhin aur chalti rahi, tab bhi jab halaat mushkil ho gaye. Tamam toofanon aur raging sea ke dauran, woh apni boat ko steady rakhne mein kamyab rahi aur apne purpose ke saath sachi rahi.

Paragraph 3:
Usne apne adventure ke har pal ko embrace kiya, aur woh unknown mein khushi manati rahi. Har din ki curiosity aur excitement use aage badhati rahi, aur woh kabhi unknown se nahi ghabrai. Woh har obstacle ko learning experience ke taur par aur badhne ke tareeke ke roop mein istemal kar saki. Jab voyage khatam hua, usne experience, confidence, aur perseverance hasil kiya tha jo uski baqi zindagi ke saath rahega.

instruction: Facial recognition technology ke bare mein diye gaye article ko 100 words ya is se kam mein summarize kariye.
input: Facial recognition technology modern duniya mein tezi se aam hoti ja rahi hai. Companies iska istemal customers ko verify karne ke liye kar rahi hain, law enforcement suspects ki investigation ke liye iska istemal kar rahi hai, aur ab hamare phones bhi sirf ek nazar se unlock ho sakte hain. Jabke koi shak nahi ke facial recognition ke positive applications ho sakte hain, misuse ka potential bhi hai. Privacy advocates ne technology ki accuracy aur governments ke apne citizens ko track karne ke liye iska istemal karne ke potential ke hawale se concerns uthaye hain.
output: Facial recognition technology tezi se har jagah aam hoti ja rahi hai, jo companies ko customers ki verification karne, law enforcement ko suspects ki investigation karne, aur hamari phones ko sirf ek nazar se unlock karne ki ijazat deti hai. Jabke iske positive uses ki potential hai, risks bhi hain, jaise ke inaccuracy, transparency ki kami, aur governments ka citizens ko track karne ke liye potential misuse. Privacy advocates ne ye concerns uthaye hain, security measures aur zyada oversight ki zarurat par zor dete hue taake ye ensure ho sake ke technology responsibly use ho.

instruction: Koi article diya gaya ho to uske main points ko 100 words mein summarize kariye.
input: 2011 mein, United Nations ne declare kiya ke paani aur sanitation human rights hain. Yeh har shakhs ke liye safe aur saaf peene ka paani aur sanitation tak rasai ke haq ki tahqeeq ki taraf aik ahem qadam tha. Iska matlab yeh tha ke har shakhs ko personal aur ghar ke istemaal ke liye paani ki munasib supply ka haq hai, saath saath hygiene ka bhi.
output: United Nations ne 2011 mein declare kiya tha ke paani aur sanitation human rights hain, matlab ke har shakhs ko safe aur clean drinking water ke saath saath proper hygiene tak rasai honi chahiye. Is ne aik universal standard introduce kiya jo har nation ko in basic resources ki delivery ke mamle mein pura karna hai. Is ne water tak rasai ki ahmiyat ko bhi recognize kiya khaas tor par dusre human rights ke liye, jaise ke health ka haq, food, aur adequate standard of living. Is ke natije mein, kai countries ne sab ke liye water tak rasai ensure karne ke liye strategies develop ki hain. Is mein infrastructure improve karna shamil hai jaise ke water supply systems aur wastewater treatment, ke saath saath water resource usage ki regulation aur monitoring ko strengthen karna.

instruction: Diye gaye book ka main theme describe kariye.
input: Of Mice and Men by John Steinbeck
output: John Steinbeck ke Of Mice and Men ka asli theme yeh hai ke individuals ka struggle hai ke woh ek sakht duniya mein unconditional acceptance hasil karein. Great Depression ke doran set kiya gaya, yeh novel George aur Lennie ko follow karta hai, jo do migrant farm workers hain, jab woh kaam dhundte hain aur California ke dusty fields mein ghar aur family ka ehsaas paane ki koshish karte hain. Raaste mein, woh mukhtalif logon se milte hain jin ke saath woh relationships banate hain, jo unhen apni sakht zindagi ki harsh realities ka samna karne par majboor karta hai. Novel ke plot aur characters us bade theme ki echo karte hain jo human need hai companionship, purpose, aur identity ki.

instruction: Jaldi mein hone wale reader ke liye is text ka summary kariye.
input: COVID-19 pandemic ki wajah se paida hone wale kai economic challenges mein se, aik natija online platforms aur services ki demand mein izafa hai jo communities ko apna business chalane aur safe rehne ke liye chahiye. Jaise jaise zyada log remotely kaam kar rahe hain aur seekh rahe hain, kai businesses ab aise services offer kar rahe hain jo unhon ne pehle provide nahi kiye the.
output: COVID-19 pandemic ne online platforms aur services ki demand barha di hai kyunke zyada log remotely kaam kar rahe hain aur seekh rahe hain. Businesses ab woh services offer kar rahe hain jo unhon ne pehle provide nahi ki thi taake woh safe reh sakein aur apna business conduct kar sakein. Is ne naye economic challenges paida kiye hain, lekin yeh in demands ko pura karne ke opportunities bhi present karte hain.

instruction: Agle text ke content ko 5 sentences mein summarize kariye.
input: Global warming Earth ke climate system ke average temperature mein long-term izafa hai. Yeh climate change ka aik major aspect hai, aur iska saboot direct temperature measurements aur warming ke mukhtalif effects ke measurements se milta hai.
output: Global warming Earth ke climate system ke average temperature mein tadreji izafa hai. Temperature mein yeh izafa zyada tar carbon dioxide aur dusre greenhouse gases ke badhte hue emissions ki wajah se hai. Yeh gases atmosphere mein zyada heat aur energy trap kar rahe hain, jis se global temperatures mein tadreji izafa ho raha hai. Insani activities, jaise ke coal aur dusre fuels jalana, in emissions ka asli source hain. Iske natije mein, climate change zyada extreme weather, sea level rise, aur species loss ka باعث ban raha hai.

Usne bhari dil se charon taraf nuqsaan ko dekha, un tamam mehnat aur lagan ke bare mein sochte hue jo usne is khet ko phaalne phoolane mein lagayi thi. Uske khayal sirf door se aane wali kawe ki awaaz se toote, jo khaaliyan mein goonj rahi thi. Apne gham ke bawajood, kisaan is khet ko dobara zinda karne ka azm rakhta tha, phir se lamba aur fakhr se khara hone ke liye.

instruction: Diye gaye article ko 200 Words mein summarize kariye.
input: https://www.bbc.com/news/world-51461830
output: Belarus mein haal hi ke protests Alexander Lukashenko ke rule ke khilaf barhtey hue narazgi ki lahar ka hissa hain, jo 1994 se mulk ki leadership kar raha hai. August se uski government ke khilaf demonstrations jari hain, aur ye ek aise election ke baad aaye hain jo badi paimane par rigged samjha gaya hai. Jaise police aur security forces ne protesters par crackdown kiya hai, movement sirf barha hai, lakho log sadko par naye leadership ke liye bulane ke liye nikle hain. Human rights activists ne government par ilzam lagaya hai ke wo protesters ko prosecute karne ke liye extreme violence istemal kar rahi hai, jis se international outcry aur European Union ki taraf se sanctions lage hain. Jaise Belarus ki situation unfold hoti ja rahi hai, international community situation ko closely monitor kar rahi hai - peaceful resolution ki umeed karte hue, lekin Belarusian state ke oppressive tactics ke khilaf bhi mazboot khade hain.

instruction: Is paragraph ko poem mein tabdeel kariye.
input: Spring tajdeed ka waqt hai. Plants kaliyan nikal rahe hain, parinde ga rahe hain, aur suraj chamak raha hai. Lambi sardi ke baad, yeh umeed aur naye shuruaat ka waqt hai.
output:
Sardi ki tareek aur udaas raat ke baad,
Garmi, josh, zindagi, aur kamyabi ka waqt.
Dunya nayi zindagi ke saath phir se khilti hai,
Thand ke dene ke baad kami ka samna.

Hawa saaf ho jati hai, parinde meetha gaate hain,
Suraj apni sunehri garmi neeche dalta hai.
Ek hawa bhar jati hai aur umeed le jati hai,
Sardi ki yaadein, ab bardaasht nahi kar sakteen.

Phool ugte hain, paudhe uthte hain,
Rang bikherte hain, aur taazgi aasmaan.
Zindagi ka ishara, ek hilti hui shururat,
Ek chamakti roshni, ek bilkul naya dil.

Bahar aa jati hai, qutbi raat par,
Zindagi ki ek koonpal, aur ek hoshiyar manzar.
Tazeegi ka pehla qadam, aur nayi shuruaat,
Ek azeem khayal, meethi jagah ka.

output: Go aur Python dono open source, cross platform programming languages hain. Go aik statically typed language hai, jabke Python dynamically typed hai. Go seedha machine code mein compile hoti hai, jabke Python interpret hoti hai. Go fast aur efficient hone ke liye design ki gayi hai, jabke Python readability aur ease of use par zyada focus karti hai. Go code likhne ke liye zyada structured approach rakhti hai, jabke Python code likhne mein zyada freedom deti hai. Go large-scale applications banane ke liye zyada suitable hai, jabke Python chhote programs aur scripts banane ke liye zyada commonly use hoti hai.

instruction: Diye gaye paragraph ke asli points ka khulasa kariye.
input: Educational technology ke main components mein se aik data-driven instruction (DDI) hai. Is qism ki instruction data ka istemal karte hue learners ko personalized learning experiences provide karti hai jo unki zarooraton ke mutabiq tailored hoti hain. DDI instruction ki efficiency improve kar sakti hai teachers ki madad karte hue ye identify karne mein ke students ko kon se topics mein help ki zaroorat hai aur un topics par focus karte hue student engagement aur achievement increase karne mein.
output: Data-driven instruction (DDI) data ka istemal karta hai instruction ki efficiency behtar banane ke liye teachers ki madad kar ke individual student needs ki pehchan karne mein, engagement aur achievement badhane ke liye, aur personalized learning experiences provide karne ke liye.

output: Article "A Review of Deep Learning Methods for Text Classification" ke sabse haal ke updates mein is baat ka analysis shamil hai ke deep learning methods jaise ke convolutional neural networks aur recurrent neural networks ko text classification problems par kaise apply kiya ja sakta hai, saath hi deep learning methods ko doosre traditional classification techniques jaise ke support vector machines ke saath combine karne ke techniques bhi. Is ke alawa, article mein deep learning models ko optimize karne ke recent approaches par bhi baat ki gayi hai, jaise ke regularization methods, hyperparameter optimization methods, aur ensemble approaches.

instruction: Is paragraph ka khulasa kariye
input: Gene therapy aik technique hai jo genetic disorders ka ilaj karne ke liye istemal hoti hai defective ya missing genes ko functioning healthy copies se replace kar ke. Yeh therapy beneficial ya corrective genes ko patient ke body mein introduce karne ke liye bhi istemal hoti hai, jo kuch diseases se ladne mein madad karti hai ya body ko unka muqabla karne mein madad karti hai.
output: Gene therapy kharab ya ghaib genes ko healthy genes se replace karta hai genetic disorders ka ilaj karne ke liye, ya phir body mein corrective genes introduce karta hai kuch diseases se larne ya unka muqabla karne ke liye.

input: Article UK economy par Brexit ke implications discuss karta hai.
output: UK ki economy ko Brexit ke natije mein mukhtalif challenges ka samna karna parega. UK ko European Union ke single market ka hissa hone ke fayde se mehroom hona parega, jis mein goods, services, capital aur labour ki free movement shamil hai. Trade flows mein kharabi aa sakti hai naye tariffs aur regulations ki wajah se, jo investment, employment aur overall economic activity mein kami kaباعث ban sakta hai. UK businesses ko additional costs uthane par sakte hain associated administrative aur logistical burdens ki wajah se. Additionally, yeh risk hai ke UK ko kuch EU-wide financial regulatory frameworks se exclude kar diya jaye.
